verbs.description: sweet - sour chicken dippers since you [V: can] chop up all the ingredients the night before this can be ready in about 30 minutes so it a great after - work dinner you can also serve it as a snack or an appetizer similar to chicken nuggets i 've even substituted quail for the chicken and it was delicious next i may try it with pork -kari caven coeur d'alene idaho
